segments.text: How do you arrange this summer vacation ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Where would you like to go ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That's really a good idea . Taking a walk on the beach and lying in the sun are pretty good . I recommend you Qingdao or Dalian .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I ’ Ve been to Qingdao before , so I ’ ll choose Dalian . I've heard that the environment there is very good .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , that's a good place to spend a holiday . Last year I went there . It's really .
segments.speaker: S1
